snippet: Timothy Mulqueen, who opened fire at the courthouse in Middletown, N.Y., was convicted last week of harassing the mayor’s daughter.
abstract: Timothy Mulqueen, recently convicted of harassing the daughter of Middletown, NY, Mayor Joseph DeStefano's, is killed by security officers after walking into a Middletown courthouse and firing a 12-gauge shotgun.
lead_paragraph: Timothy Mulqueen, who opened fire at the courthouse in Middletown, N.Y., was convicted last week of harassing the mayor’s daughter.

headline.seo: Courthouse Shooting in Middletown Leaves Gunman Dead
headline.main: Officers Kill Armed Man in Courthouse
headline.print_headline: Officers Kill Armed Man In Courthouse
